node.name: webcam-ascii
node.description: Convert webcam video to ASCII https://webcam-ascii.netlify.app/

node.name: ker-e-bians
node.description: Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gGzA_BMI9EQ . Project for Kerbspace Hack. Ker-e-bians calculates the optimized path that guides you through the roads with the most parking spots possible, based on your preferences. The frontend is here: https://github.com/szib/ker-e-bians

node.name: spring-custom-cache
node.description: Override of the Spring's ConcurrentCacheMap that automatically caches collection elements individually

node.name: QueueR-backend
node.description: Project for TechFest Munich Hackathon 2019. QueueR is an app prototype based on a dynamic queue system and the use of QR codes to reduce waiting times in the hospitals and improve patient experience. The frontend is here:  https://github.com/helgardferreira/queuer-frontend
